methods.name: start
methods.description: Notify bar you are waiting for a new process to finish
methods.description_zh: 通知栏您正在等待新进程完成

methods.name: increment
methods.description: Manually trigger a bar progress increment
methods.description_zh: 手动触发柱线进度增量

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Notify bar that one process you were waiting has finished
methods.description_zh: 通知栏您正在等待的一个进程已完成

events.name: start
events.description: Emitted when bar is triggered to appear

events.name: stop
events.description: Emitted when bar has finished its job
events.description_zh: 当棒完成其工作时发出

position.description: Position within window of where QAjaxBar should be displayed
position.description_zh: 在窗口内应显示 QAjaxBar 的位置

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

skip-hijack.description: Skip Ajax hijacking (not a reactive prop)
skip-hijack.description_zh: 跳过 Ajax 劫持（不是反应性道具）

hijack-filter.description: Filter which URL should trigger start() + stop()
hijack-filter.description_zh: 过滤哪个 URL 应该触发 start（） + stop（）
